2840        return offspring

Applies the adaptive mutation based on the 2 parameters 'mutation_num_genes' and 'gene_space'. A number of genes equal are selected randomly for mutation. This number depends on the fitness of the solution. The random values are selected from the 'gene_space' parameter. It accepts a single parameter: -offspring: The offspring to mutate. It returns an array of the mutated offspring.

def adaptive_mutation_randomly(self, offspring): 
2842    def adaptive_mutation_randomly(self, offspring):
2843
2844        """
2845        Applies the adaptive mutation based on the 'mutation_num_genes' parameter.
2846        A number of genes equal are selected randomly for mutation. This number depends on the fitness of the solution.
2847        The random values are selected based on the 2 parameters 'random_mutation_min_val' and 'random_mutation_max_val'.
2848        It accepts a single parameter:
2849            -offspring: The offspring to mutate.
2850        It returns an array of the mutated offspring.
2851        """
2852
2853        average_fitness, offspring_fitness = self.adaptive_mutation_population_fitness(offspring)
2854
2855        # Adaptive random mutation changes one or more genes in each offspring randomly.
2856        # The number of genes to mutate depends on the solution's fitness value.
2857        for offspring_idx in range(offspring.shape[0]):
2858            if offspring_fitness[offspring_idx] < average_fitness:
2859                adaptive_mutation_num_genes = self.mutation_num_genes[0]
2860            else:
2861                adaptive_mutation_num_genes = self.mutation_num_genes[1]
2862            mutation_indices = numpy.array(random.sample(range(0, self.num_genes), adaptive_mutation_num_genes))
2863            for gene_idx in mutation_indices:
2864                # Generating a random value.
2865                random_value = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.random_mutation_min_val,
2866                                                    high=self.random_mutation_max_val,
2867                                                    size=1)
2868                # If the mutation_by_replacement attribute is True, then the random value replaces the current gene value.
2869                if self.mutation_by_replacement:
2870                    if self.gene_type_single == True:
2871                        random_value = self.gene_type[0](random_value)
2872                    else:
2873                        random_value = self.gene_type[gene_idx][0](random_value)
2874                        if type(random_value) is numpy.ndarray:
2875                            random_value = random_value[0]
2876                # If the mutation_by_replacement attribute is False, then the random value is added to the gene value.
2877                else:
2878                    if self.gene_type_single == True:
2879                        random_value = self.gene_type[0](offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] + random_value)
2880                    else:
2881                        random_value = self.gene_type[gene_idx][0](offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] + random_value)
2882                        if type(random_value) is numpy.ndarray:
2883                            random_value = random_value[0]
2884
2885                if self.gene_type_single == True:
2886                    if not self.gene_type[1] is None:
2887                        random_value = numpy.round(random_value, self.gene_type[1])
2888                else:
2889                    if not self.gene_type[gene_idx][1] is None:
2890                        random_value = numpy.round(random_value, self.gene_type[gene_idx][1])
2891
2892                offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] = random_value
2893
2894                if self.allow_duplicate_genes == False:
2895                    offspring[offspring_idx], _, _ = self.solve_duplicate_genes_randomly(
2896                        solution=offspring[offspring_idx],
2897                        min_val=self.random_mutation_min_val,
2898                        max_val=self.random_mutation_max_val,
2899                        mutation_by_replacement=self.mutation_by_replacement,
2900                        gene_type=self.gene_type,
2901                        num_trials=10)
2902        return offspring

Applies the adaptive mutation based on the 'mutation_num_genes' parameter. A number of genes equal are selected randomly for mutation. This number depends on the fitness of the solution. The random values are selected based on the 2 parameters 'random_mutation_min_val' and 'random_mutation_max_val'. It accepts a single parameter: -offspring: The offspring to mutate. It returns an array of the mutated offspring.

def adaptive_mutation_probs_by_space(self, offspring): 
2904    def adaptive_mutation_probs_by_space(self, offspring):
2905
2906        """
2907        Applies the adaptive mutation based on the 2 parameters 'mutation_probability' and 'gene_space'.
2908        Based on whether the solution fitness is above or below a threshold, the mutation is applied diffrently by mutating high or low number of genes.
2909        The random values are selected based on space of values for each gene.
2910        It accepts a single parameter:
2911            -offspring: The offspring to mutate.
2912        It returns an array of the mutated offspring.
2913        """
2914
2915        # For each offspring, a value from the gene space is selected randomly and assigned to the selected gene for mutation.
2916
2917        average_fitness, offspring_fitness = self.adaptive_mutation_population_fitness(offspring)
2918
2919        # Adaptive random mutation changes one or more genes in each offspring randomly.
2920        # The probability of mutating a gene depends on the solution's fitness value.
2921        for offspring_idx in range(offspring.shape[0]):
2922            if offspring_fitness[offspring_idx] < average_fitness:
2923                adaptive_mutation_probability = self.mutation_probability[0]
2924            else:
2925                adaptive_mutation_probability = self.mutation_probability[1]
2926
2927            probs = numpy.random.random(size=offspring.shape[1])
2928            for gene_idx in range(offspring.shape[1]):
2929                if probs[gene_idx] <= adaptive_mutation_probability:
2930                    if self.gene_space_nested:
2931                        # Returning the current gene space from the 'gene_space' attribute.
2932                        if type(self.gene_space[gene_idx]) in [numpy.ndarray, list]:
2933                            curr_gene_space = self.gene_space[gene_idx].copy()
2934                        else:
2935                            curr_gene_space = self.gene_space[gene_idx]
2936
2937                        # If the gene space has only a single value, use it as the new gene value.
2938                        if type(curr_gene_space) in GA.supported_int_float_types:
2939                            value_from_space = curr_gene_space
2940                        # If the gene space is None, apply mutation by adding a random value between the range defined by the 2 parameters 'random_mutation_min_val' and 'random_mutation_max_val'.
2941                        elif curr_gene_space is None:
2942                            rand_val = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.random_mutation_min_val,
2943                                                            high=self.random_mutation_max_val,
2944                                                            size=1)
2945                            if self.mutation_by_replacement:
2946                                value_from_space = rand_val
2947                            else:
2948                                value_from_space = offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] + rand_val
2949                        elif type(curr_gene_space) is dict:
2950                            # Selecting a value randomly from the current gene's space in the 'gene_space' attribute.
2951                            if 'step' in curr_gene_space.keys():
2952                                value_from_space = numpy.random.choice(numpy.arange(start=curr_gene_space['low'],
2953                                                                                    stop=curr_gene_space['high'],
2954                                                                                    step=curr_gene_space['step']),
2955                                                                       size=1)
2956                            else:
2957                                value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=curr_gene_space['low'],
2958                                                                        high=curr_gene_space['high'],
2959                                                                        size=1)
2960                        else:
2961                            # Selecting a value randomly from the current gene's space in the 'gene_space' attribute.
2962                            # If the gene space has only 1 value, then select it. The old and new values of the gene are identical.
2963                            if len(curr_gene_space) == 1:
2964                                value_from_space = curr_gene_space[0]
2965                            # If the gene space has more than 1 value, then select a new one that is different from the current value.
2966                            else:
2967                                values_to_select_from = list(
2968                                    set(curr_gene_space) - set([offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx]]))
2969                                if len(values_to_select_from) == 0:
2970                                    value_from_space = offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx]
2971                                else:
2972                                    value_from_space = random.choice(values_to_select_from)
2973                    else:
2974                        # Selecting a value randomly from the global gene space in the 'gene_space' attribute.
2975                        if type(self.gene_space) is dict:
2976                            if 'step' in self.gene_space.keys():
2977                                value_from_space = numpy.random.choice(numpy.arange(start=self.gene_space['low'],
2978                                                                                    stop=self.gene_space['high'],
2979                                                                                    step=self.gene_space['step']),
2980                                                                       size=1)
2981                            else:
2982                                value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.gene_space['low'],
2983                                                                        high=self.gene_space['high'],
2984                                                                        size=1)
2985                        else:
2986                            values_to_select_from = list(
2987                                set(self.gene_space) - set([offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx]]))
2988                            if len(values_to_select_from) == 0:
2989                                value_from_space = offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx]
2990                            else:
2991                                value_from_space = random.choice(values_to_select_from)
2992
2993                    if value_from_space is None:
2994                        value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.random_mutation_min_val,
2995                                                                high=self.random_mutation_max_val,
2996                                                                size=1)
2997
2998                    # Assinging the selected value from the space to the gene.
2999                    if self.gene_type_single == True:
3000                        if not self.gene_type[1] is None:
3001                            offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] = numpy.round(self.gene_type[0](value_from_space),
3002                                                                             self.gene_type[1])
3003                        else:
3004                            offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] = self.gene_type[0](value_from_space)
3005                    else:
3006                        if not self.gene_type[gene_idx][1] is None:
3007                            offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] = numpy.round(
3008                                self.gene_type[gene_idx][0](value_from_space),
3009                                self.gene_type[gene_idx][1])
3010                        else:
3011                            offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] = self.gene_type[gene_idx][0](value_from_space)
3012
3013                    if self.allow_duplicate_genes == False:
3014                        offspring[offspring_idx], _, _ = self.solve_duplicate_genes_by_space(
3015                            solution=offspring[offspring_idx],
3016                            gene_type=self.gene_type,
3017                            num_trials=10)
3018        return offspring

Applies the adaptive mutation based on the 2 parameters 'mutation_probability' and 'gene_space'. Based on whether the solution fitness is above or below a threshold, the mutation is applied diffrently by mutating high or low number of genes. The random values are selected based on space of values for each gene. It accepts a single parameter: -offspring: The offspring to mutate. It returns an array of the mutated offspring.

def adaptive_mutation_probs_randomly(self, offspring): 
3020    def adaptive_mutation_probs_randomly(self, offspring):
3021
3022        """
3023        Applies the adaptive mutation based on the 'mutation_probability' parameter.
3024        Based on whether the solution fitness is above or below a threshold, the mutation is applied diffrently by mutating high or low number of genes.
3025        The random values are selected based on the 2 parameters 'random_mutation_min_val' and 'random_mutation_max_val'.
3026        It accepts a single parameter:
3027            -offspring: The offspring to mutate.
3028        It returns an array of the mutated offspring.
3029        """
3030
3031        average_fitness, offspring_fitness = self.adaptive_mutation_population_fitness(offspring)
3032
3033        # Adaptive random mutation changes one or more genes in each offspring randomly.
3034        # The probability of mutating a gene depends on the solution's fitness value.
3035        for offspring_idx in range(offspring.shape[0]):
3036            if offspring_fitness[offspring_idx] < average_fitness:
3037                adaptive_mutation_probability = self.mutation_probability[0]
3038            else:
3039                adaptive_mutation_probability = self.mutation_probability[1]
3040
3041            probs = numpy.random.random(size=offspring.shape[1])
3042            for gene_idx in range(offspring.shape[1]):
3043                if probs[gene_idx] <= adaptive_mutation_probability:
3044                    # Generating a random value.
3045                    random_value = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3046                                                        high=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3047                                                        size=1)
3048                    # If the mutation_by_replacement attribute is True, then the random value replaces the current gene value.
3049                    if self.mutation_by_replacement:
3050                        if self.gene_type_single == True:
3051                            random_value = self.gene_type[0](random_value)
3052                        else:
3053                            random_value = self.gene_type[gene_idx][0](random_value)
3054                            if type(random_value) is numpy.ndarray:
3055                                random_value = random_value[0]
3056                    # If the mutation_by_replacement attribute is False, then the random value is added to the gene value.
3057                    else:
3058                        if self.gene_type_single == True:
3059                            random_value = self.gene_type[0](offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] + random_value)
3060                        else:
3061                            random_value = self.gene_type[gene_idx][0](
3062                                offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] + random_value)
3063                            if type(random_value) is numpy.ndarray:
3064                                random_value = random_value[0]
3065
3066                    if self.gene_type_single == True:
3067                        if not self.gene_type[1] is None:
3068                            random_value = numpy.round(random_value, self.gene_type[1])
3069                    else:
3070                        if not self.gene_type[gene_idx][1] is None:
3071                            random_value = numpy.round(random_value, self.gene_type[gene_idx][1])
3072
3073                    offspring[offspring_idx, gene_idx] = random_value
3074
3075                    if self.allow_duplicate_genes == False:
3076                        offspring[offspring_idx], _, _ = self.solve_duplicate_genes_randomly(
3077                            solution=offspring[offspring_idx],
3078                            min_val=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3079                            max_val=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3080                            mutation_by_replacement=self.mutation_by_replacement,
3081                            gene_type=self.gene_type,
3082                            num_trials=10)
3083        return offspring

Applies the adaptive mutation based on the 'mutation_probability' parameter. Based on whether the solution fitness is above or below a threshold, the mutation is applied diffrently by mutating high or low number of genes. The random values are selected based on the 2 parameters 'random_mutation_min_val' and 'random_mutation_max_val'. It accepts a single parameter: -offspring: The offspring to mutate. It returns an array of the mutated offspring.

def solve_duplicate_genes_randomly( self, solution, min_val, max_val, mutation_by_replacement, gene_type, num_trials=10): 
3085    def solve_duplicate_genes_randomly(self, solution, min_val, max_val, mutation_by_replacement, gene_type,
3086                                       num_trials=10):
3087
3088        """
3089        Solves the duplicates in a solution by randomly selecting new values for the duplicating genes.
3090
3091        solution: A solution with duplicate values.
3092        min_val: Minimum value of the range to sample a number randomly.
3093        max_val: Maximum value of the range to sample a number randomly.
3094        mutation_by_replacement: Identical to the self.mutation_by_replacement attribute.
3095        gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute.
3096        num_trials: Maximum number of trials to change the gene value to solve the duplicates.
3097
3098        Returns:
3099            new_solution: Solution after trying to solve its duplicates. If no duplicates solved, then it is identical to the passed solution parameter.
3100            not_unique_indices: Indices of the genes with duplicate values.
3101            num_unsolved_duplicates: Number of unsolved duplicates.
3102        """
3103
3104        new_solution = solution.copy()
3105
3106        _, unique_gene_indices = numpy.unique(solution, return_index=True)
3107        not_unique_indices = set(range(len(solution))) - set(unique_gene_indices)
3108
3109        num_unsolved_duplicates = 0
3110        if len(not_unique_indices) > 0:
3111            for duplicate_index in not_unique_indices:
3112                for trial_index in range(num_trials):
3113                    if self.gene_type_single == True:
3114                        if gene_type[0] in GA.supported_int_types:
3115                            temp_val = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=new_solution,
3116                                                                       gene_index=duplicate_index,
3117                                                                       min_val=min_val,
3118                                                                       max_val=max_val,
3119                                                                       mutation_by_replacement=mutation_by_replacement,
3120                                                                       gene_type=gene_type)
3121                        else:
3122                            temp_val = numpy.random.uniform(low=min_val,
3123                                                            high=max_val,
3124                                                            size=1)
3125                            if mutation_by_replacement:
3126                                pass
3127                            else:
3128                                temp_val = new_solution[duplicate_index] + temp_val
3129                    else:
3130                        if gene_type[duplicate_index] in GA.supported_int_types:
3131                            temp_val = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=new_solution,
3132                                                                       gene_index=duplicate_index,
3133                                                                       min_val=min_val,
3134                                                                       max_val=max_val,
3135                                                                       mutation_by_replacement=mutation_by_replacement,
3136                                                                       gene_type=gene_type)
3137                        else:
3138                            temp_val = numpy.random.uniform(low=min_val,
3139                                                            high=max_val,
3140                                                            size=1)
3141                            if mutation_by_replacement:
3142                                pass
3143                            else:
3144                                temp_val = new_solution[duplicate_index] + temp_val
3145
3146                    if self.gene_type_single == True:
3147                        if not gene_type[1] is None:
3148                            temp_val = numpy.round(gene_type[0](temp_val),
3149                                                   gene_type[1])
3150                        else:
3151                            temp_val = gene_type[0](temp_val)
3152                    else:
3153                        if not gene_type[duplicate_index][1] is None:
3154                            temp_val = numpy.round(gene_type[duplicate_index][0](temp_val),
3155                                                   gene_type[duplicate_index][1])
3156                        else:
3157                            temp_val = gene_type[duplicate_index][0](temp_val)
3158
3159                    if temp_val in new_solution and trial_index == (num_trials - 1):
3160                        num_unsolved_duplicates = num_unsolved_duplicates + 1
3161                        if not self.suppress_warnings: warnings.warn(
3162                            "Failed to find a unique value for gene with index {gene_idx} whose value is {gene_value}. Consider adding more values in the gene space or use a wider range for initial population or random mutation.".format(
3163                                gene_idx=duplicate_index, gene_value=solution[duplicate_index]))
3164                    elif temp_val in new_solution:
3165                        continue
3166                    else:
3167                        new_solution[duplicate_index] = temp_val
3168                        break
3169
3170                # Update the list of duplicate indices after each iteration.
3171                _, unique_gene_indices = numpy.unique(new_solution, return_index=True)
3172                not_unique_indices = set(range(len(solution))) - set(unique_gene_indices)
3173                # print("not_unique_indices INSIDE", not_unique_indices)
3174
3175        return new_solution, not_unique_indices, num_unsolved_duplicates

Solves the duplicates in a solution by randomly selecting new values for the duplicating genes.

solution: A solution with duplicate values. min_val: Minimum value of the range to sample a number randomly. max_val: Maximum value of the range to sample a number randomly. mutation_by_replacement: Identical to the self.mutation_by_replacement attribute. gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute. num_trials: Maximum number of trials to change the gene value to solve the duplicates.

Returns: new_solution: Solution after trying to solve its duplicates. If no duplicates solved, then it is identical to the passed solution parameter. not_unique_indices: Indices of the genes with duplicate values. num_unsolved_duplicates: Number of unsolved duplicates.

def solve_duplicate_genes_by_space(self, solution, gene_type, num_trials=10, build_initial_pop=False): 
3177    def solve_duplicate_genes_by_space(self, solution, gene_type, num_trials=10, build_initial_pop=False):
3178
3179        """
3180        Solves the duplicates in a solution by selecting values for the duplicating genes from the gene space.
3181
3182        solution: A solution with duplicate values.
3183        gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute.
3184        num_trials: Maximum number of trials to change the gene value to solve the duplicates.
3185
3186        Returns:
3187            new_solution: Solution after trying to solve its duplicates. If no duplicates solved, then it is identical to the passed solution parameter.
3188            not_unique_indices: Indices of the genes with duplicate values.
3189            num_unsolved_duplicates: Number of unsolved duplicates.
3190        """
3191
3192        new_solution = solution.copy()
3193
3194        _, unique_gene_indices = numpy.unique(solution, return_index=True)
3195        not_unique_indices = set(range(len(solution))) - set(unique_gene_indices)
3196        # print("not_unique_indices OUTSIDE", not_unique_indices)
3197
3198        # First try to solve the duplicates.
3199        # For a solution like [3 2 0 0], the indices of the 2 duplicating genes are 2 and 3.
3200        # The next call to the find_unique_value() method tries to change the value of the gene with index 3 to solve the duplicate.
3201        if len(not_unique_indices) > 0:
3202            new_solution, not_unique_indices, num_unsolved_duplicates = self.unique_genes_by_space(
3203                new_solution=new_solution,
3204                gene_type=gene_type,
3205                not_unique_indices=not_unique_indices,
3206                num_trials=10,
3207                build_initial_pop=build_initial_pop)
3208        else:
3209            return new_solution, not_unique_indices, len(not_unique_indices)
3210
3211        # Do another try if there exist duplicate genes.
3212        # If there are no possible values for the gene 3 with index 3 to solve the duplicate, try to change the value of the other gene with index 2.
3213        if len(not_unique_indices) > 0:
3214            not_unique_indices = set(numpy.where(new_solution == new_solution[list(not_unique_indices)[0]])[0]) - set(
3215                [list(not_unique_indices)[0]])
3216            new_solution, not_unique_indices, num_unsolved_duplicates = self.unique_genes_by_space(
3217                new_solution=new_solution,
3218                gene_type=gene_type,
3219                not_unique_indices=not_unique_indices,
3220                num_trials=10,
3221                build_initial_pop=build_initial_pop)
3222        else:
3223            # If there exist duplicate genes, then changing either of the 2 duplicating genes (with indices 2 and 3) will not solve the problem.
3224            # This problem can be solved by randomly changing one of the non-duplicating genes that may make a room for a unique value in one the 2 duplicating genes.
3225            # For example, if gene_space=[[3, 0, 1], [4, 1, 2], [0, 2], [3, 2, 0]] and the solution is [3 2 0 0], then the values of the last 2 genes duplicate.
3226            # There are no possible changes in the last 2 genes to solve the problem. But it could be solved by changing the second gene from 2 to 4.
3227            # As a result, any of the last 2 genes can take the value 2 and solve the duplicates.
3228            return new_solution, not_unique_indices, len(not_unique_indices)
3229
3230        return new_solution, not_unique_indices, num_unsolved_duplicates

Solves the duplicates in a solution by selecting values for the duplicating genes from the gene space.

solution: A solution with duplicate values. gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute. num_trials: Maximum number of trials to change the gene value to solve the duplicates.

Returns: new_solution: Solution after trying to solve its duplicates. If no duplicates solved, then it is identical to the passed solution parameter. not_unique_indices: Indices of the genes with duplicate values. num_unsolved_duplicates: Number of unsolved duplicates.

def solve_duplicate_genes_by_space_OLD(self, solution, gene_type, num_trials=10): 
3232    def solve_duplicate_genes_by_space_OLD(self, solution, gene_type, num_trials=10):
3233        # /////////////////////////
3234        # Just for testing purposes.
3235        # /////////////////////////
3236
3237        new_solution = solution.copy()
3238
3239        _, unique_gene_indices = numpy.unique(solution, return_index=True)
3240        not_unique_indices = set(range(len(solution))) - set(unique_gene_indices)
3241        # print("not_unique_indices OUTSIDE", not_unique_indices)
3242
3243        num_unsolved_duplicates = 0
3244        if len(not_unique_indices) > 0:
3245            for duplicate_index in not_unique_indices:
3246                for trial_index in range(num_trials):
3247                    temp_val = self.unique_gene_by_space(solution=solution,
3248                                                         gene_idx=duplicate_index,
3249                                                         gene_type=gene_type)
3250
3251                    if temp_val in new_solution and trial_index == (num_trials - 1):
3252                        # print("temp_val, duplicate_index", temp_val, duplicate_index, new_solution)
3253                        num_unsolved_duplicates = num_unsolved_duplicates + 1
3254                        if not self.suppress_warnings: warnings.warn(
3255                            "Failed to find a unique value for gene with index {gene_idx}".format(
3256                                gene_idx=duplicate_index))
3257                    elif temp_val in new_solution:
3258                        continue
3259                    else:
3260                        new_solution[duplicate_index] = temp_val
3261                        # print("SOLVED", duplicate_index)
3262                        break
3263
3264                # Update the list of duplicate indices after each iteration.
3265                _, unique_gene_indices = numpy.unique(new_solution, return_index=True)
3266                not_unique_indices = set(range(len(solution))) - set(unique_gene_indices)
3267                # print("not_unique_indices INSIDE", not_unique_indices)
3268
3269        return new_solution, not_unique_indices, num_unsolved_duplicates
def unique_int_gene_from_range( self, solution, gene_index, min_val, max_val, mutation_by_replacement, gene_type, step=None): 
3271    def unique_int_gene_from_range(self, solution, gene_index, min_val, max_val, mutation_by_replacement, gene_type,
3272                                   step=None):
3273
3274        """
3275        Finds a unique integer value for the gene.
3276
3277        solution: A solution with duplicate values.
3278        gene_index: Index of the gene to find a unique value.
3279        min_val: Minimum value of the range to sample a number randomly.
3280        max_val: Maximum value of the range to sample a number randomly.
3281        mutation_by_replacement: Identical to the self.mutation_by_replacement attribute.
3282        gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute.
3283
3284        Returns:
3285            selected_value: The new value of the gene. It may be identical to the original gene value in case there are no possible unique values for the gene.
3286        """
3287
3288        if self.gene_type_single == True:
3289            if step is None:
3290                all_gene_values = numpy.arange(min_val, max_val, dtype=gene_type[0])
3291            else:
3292                # For non-integer steps, the numpy.arange() function returns zeros id the dtype parameter is set to an integer data type. So, this returns zeros if step is non-integer and dtype is set to an int data type: numpy.arange(min_val, max_val, step, dtype=gene_type[0])
3293                # To solve this issue, the data type casting will not be handled inside numpy.arange(). The range is generated by numpy.arange() and then the data type is converted using the numpy.asarray() function.
3294                all_gene_values = numpy.asarray(numpy.arange(min_val, max_val, step), dtype=gene_type[0])
3295        else:
3296            if step is None:
3297                all_gene_values = numpy.arange(min_val, max_val, dtype=gene_type[gene_index][0])
3298            else:
3299                all_gene_values = numpy.asarray(numpy.arange(min_val, max_val, step), dtype=gene_type[gene_index][0])
3300
3301        if mutation_by_replacement:
3302            pass
3303        else:
3304            all_gene_values = all_gene_values + solution[gene_index]
3305
3306        if self.gene_type_single == True:
3307            if not gene_type[1] is None:
3308                all_gene_values = numpy.round(gene_type[0](all_gene_values),
3309                                              gene_type[1])
3310            else:
3311                if type(all_gene_values) is numpy.ndarray:
3312                    all_gene_values = numpy.asarray(all_gene_values, dtype=gene_type[0])
3313                else:
3314                    all_gene_values = gene_type[0](all_gene_values)
3315        else:
3316            if not gene_type[gene_index][1] is None:
3317                all_gene_values = numpy.round(gene_type[gene_index][0](all_gene_values),
3318                                              gene_type[gene_index][1])
3319            else:
3320                all_gene_values = gene_type[gene_index][0](all_gene_values)
3321
3322        values_to_select_from = list(set(all_gene_values) - set(solution))
3323
3324        if len(values_to_select_from) == 0:
3325            if not self.suppress_warnings: warnings.warn(
3326                "You set 'allow_duplicate_genes=False' but there is no enough values to prevent duplicates.")
3327            selected_value = solution[gene_index]
3328        else:
3329            selected_value = random.choice(values_to_select_from)
3330
3331        # if self.gene_type_single == True:
3332        #    selected_value = gene_type[0](selected_value)
3333        # else:
3334        #    selected_value = gene_type[gene_index][0](selected_value)
3335
3336        return selected_value

Finds a unique integer value for the gene.

solution: A solution with duplicate values. gene_index: Index of the gene to find a unique value. min_val: Minimum value of the range to sample a number randomly. max_val: Maximum value of the range to sample a number randomly. mutation_by_replacement: Identical to the self.mutation_by_replacement attribute. gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute.

Returns: selected_value: The new value of the gene. It may be identical to the original gene value in case there are no possible unique values for the gene.

def unique_genes_by_space( self, new_solution, gene_type, not_unique_indices, num_trials=10, build_initial_pop=False): 
3338    def unique_genes_by_space(self, new_solution, gene_type, not_unique_indices, num_trials=10,
3339                              build_initial_pop=False):
3340
3341        """
3342        Loops through all the duplicating genes to find unique values that from their gene spaces to solve the duplicates.
3343        For each duplicating gene, a call to the unique_gene_by_space() is made.
3344
3345        new_solution: A solution with duplicate values.
3346        gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute.
3347        not_unique_indices: Indices with duplicating values.
3348        num_trials: Maximum number of trials to change the gene value to solve the duplicates.
3349
3350        Returns:
3351            new_solution: Solution after trying to solve all of its duplicates. If no duplicates solved, then it is identical to the passed solution parameter.
3352            not_unique_indices: Indices of the genes with duplicate values.
3353            num_unsolved_duplicates: Number of unsolved duplicates.
3354        """
3355
3356        num_unsolved_duplicates = 0
3357        for duplicate_index in not_unique_indices:
3358            for trial_index in range(num_trials):
3359                temp_val = self.unique_gene_by_space(solution=new_solution,
3360                                                     gene_idx=duplicate_index,
3361                                                     gene_type=gene_type,
3362                                                     build_initial_pop=build_initial_pop)
3363
3364                if temp_val in new_solution and trial_index == (num_trials - 1):
3365                    # print("temp_val, duplicate_index", temp_val, duplicate_index, new_solution)
3366                    num_unsolved_duplicates = num_unsolved_duplicates + 1
3367                    if not self.suppress_warnings: warnings.warn(
3368                        "Failed to find a unique value for gene with index {gene_idx} whose value is {gene_value}. Consider adding more values in the gene space or use a wider range for initial population or random mutation.".format(
3369                            gene_idx=duplicate_index, gene_value=new_solution[duplicate_index]))
3370                elif temp_val in new_solution:
3371                    continue
3372                else:
3373                    new_solution[duplicate_index] = temp_val
3374                    # print("SOLVED", duplicate_index)
3375                    break
3376
3377        # Update the list of duplicate indices after each iteration.
3378        _, unique_gene_indices = numpy.unique(new_solution, return_index=True)
3379        not_unique_indices = set(range(len(new_solution))) - set(unique_gene_indices)
3380        # print("not_unique_indices INSIDE", not_unique_indices)
3381
3382        return new_solution, not_unique_indices, num_unsolved_duplicates

Loops through all the duplicating genes to find unique values that from their gene spaces to solve the duplicates. For each duplicating gene, a call to the unique_gene_by_space() is made.

new_solution: A solution with duplicate values. gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute. not_unique_indices: Indices with duplicating values. num_trials: Maximum number of trials to change the gene value to solve the duplicates.

Returns: new_solution: Solution after trying to solve all of its duplicates. If no duplicates solved, then it is identical to the passed solution parameter. not_unique_indices: Indices of the genes with duplicate values. num_unsolved_duplicates: Number of unsolved duplicates.

def unique_gene_by_space(self, solution, gene_idx, gene_type, build_initial_pop=False): 
3384    def unique_gene_by_space(self, solution, gene_idx, gene_type, build_initial_pop=False):
3385
3386        """
3387        Returns a unique gene value for a single gene based on its value space to solve the duplicates.
3388
3389        solution: A solution with duplicate values.
3390        gene_idx: The index of the gene that duplicates its value with another gene.
3391        gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute.
3392
3393        Returns:
3394            A unique value, if exists, for the gene.
3395        """
3396
3397        if self.gene_space_nested:
3398            # Returning the current gene space from the 'gene_space' attribute.
3399            if type(self.gene_space[gene_idx]) in [numpy.ndarray, list]:
3400                curr_gene_space = self.gene_space[gene_idx].copy()
3401            else:
3402                curr_gene_space = self.gene_space[gene_idx]
3403
3404            # If the gene space has only a single value, use it as the new gene value.
3405            if type(curr_gene_space) in GA.supported_int_float_types:
3406                value_from_space = curr_gene_space
3407                # If the gene space is None, apply mutation by adding a random value between the range defined by the 2 parameters 'random_mutation_min_val' and 'random_mutation_max_val'.
3408            elif curr_gene_space is None:
3409                if self.gene_type_single == True:
3410                    if gene_type[0] in GA.supported_int_types:
3411                        if build_initial_pop == True:
3412                            value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3413                                                                               gene_index=gene_idx,
3414                                                                               min_val=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3415                                                                               max_val=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3416                                                                               mutation_by_replacement=True,
3417                                                                               gene_type=gene_type)
3418                        else:
3419                            value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3420                                                                               gene_index=gene_idx,
3421                                                                               min_val=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3422                                                                               max_val=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3423                                                                               mutation_by_replacement=True,
3424                                                                               # self.mutation_by_replacement,
3425                                                                               gene_type=gene_type)
3426                    else:
3427                        value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3428                                                                high=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3429                                                                size=1)
3430                        if self.mutation_by_replacement:
3431                            pass
3432                        else:
3433                            value_from_space = solution[gene_idx] + value_from_space
3434                else:
3435                    if gene_type[gene_idx] in GA.supported_int_types:
3436                        if build_initial_pop == True:
3437                            value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3438                                                                               gene_index=gene_idx,
3439                                                                               min_val=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3440                                                                               max_val=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3441                                                                               mutation_by_replacement=True,
3442                                                                               gene_type=gene_type)
3443                        else:
3444                            value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3445                                                                               gene_index=gene_idx,
3446                                                                               min_val=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3447                                                                               max_val=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3448                                                                               mutation_by_replacement=True,
3449                                                                               # self.mutation_by_replacement,
3450                                                                               gene_type=gene_type)
3451                    else:
3452                        value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3453                                                                high=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3454                                                                size=1)
3455                        if self.mutation_by_replacement:
3456                            pass
3457                        else:
3458                            value_from_space = solution[gene_idx] + value_from_space
3459
3460            elif type(curr_gene_space) is dict:
3461                if self.gene_type_single == True:
3462                    if gene_type[0] in GA.supported_int_types:
3463                        if build_initial_pop == True:
3464                            if 'step' in curr_gene_space.keys():
3465                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3466                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3467                                                                                   min_val=curr_gene_space['low'],
3468                                                                                   max_val=curr_gene_space['high'],
3469                                                                                   step=curr_gene_space['step'],
3470                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3471                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3472                            else:
3473                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3474                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3475                                                                                   min_val=curr_gene_space['low'],
3476                                                                                   max_val=curr_gene_space['high'],
3477                                                                                   step=None,
3478                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3479                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3480                        else:
3481                            if 'step' in curr_gene_space.keys():
3482                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3483                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3484                                                                                   min_val=curr_gene_space['low'],
3485                                                                                   max_val=curr_gene_space['high'],
3486                                                                                   step=curr_gene_space['step'],
3487                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3488                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3489                            else:
3490                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3491                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3492                                                                                   min_val=curr_gene_space['low'],
3493                                                                                   max_val=curr_gene_space['high'],
3494                                                                                   step=None,
3495                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3496                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3497                    else:
3498                        if 'step' in curr_gene_space.keys():
3499                            value_from_space = numpy.random.choice(numpy.arange(start=curr_gene_space['low'],
3500                                                                                stop=curr_gene_space['high'],
3501                                                                                step=curr_gene_space['step']),
3502                                                                   size=1)
3503                        else:
3504                            value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=curr_gene_space['low'],
3505                                                                    high=curr_gene_space['high'],
3506                                                                    size=1)
3507                        if self.mutation_by_replacement:
3508                            pass
3509                        else:
3510                            value_from_space = solution[gene_idx] + value_from_space
3511                else:
3512                    if gene_type[gene_idx] in GA.supported_int_types:
3513                        if build_initial_pop == True:
3514                            if 'step' in curr_gene_space.keys():
3515                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3516                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3517                                                                                   min_val=curr_gene_space['low'],
3518                                                                                   max_val=curr_gene_space['high'],
3519                                                                                   step=curr_gene_space['step'],
3520                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3521                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3522                            else:
3523                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3524                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3525                                                                                   min_val=curr_gene_space['low'],
3526                                                                                   max_val=curr_gene_space['high'],
3527                                                                                   step=None,
3528                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3529                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3530                        else:
3531                            if 'step' in curr_gene_space.keys():
3532                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3533                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3534                                                                                   min_val=curr_gene_space['low'],
3535                                                                                   max_val=curr_gene_space['high'],
3536                                                                                   step=curr_gene_space['step'],
3537                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3538                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3539                            else:
3540                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3541                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3542                                                                                   min_val=curr_gene_space['low'],
3543                                                                                   max_val=curr_gene_space['high'],
3544                                                                                   step=None,
3545                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3546                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3547                    else:
3548                        if 'step' in curr_gene_space.keys():
3549                            value_from_space = numpy.random.choice(numpy.arange(start=curr_gene_space['low'],
3550                                                                                stop=curr_gene_space['high'],
3551                                                                                step=curr_gene_space['step']),
3552                                                                   size=1)
3553                        else:
3554                            value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=curr_gene_space['low'],
3555                                                                    high=curr_gene_space['high'],
3556                                                                    size=1)
3557                        if self.mutation_by_replacement:
3558                            pass
3559                        else:
3560                            value_from_space = solution[gene_idx] + value_from_space
3561
3562            else:
3563                # Selecting a value randomly based on the current gene's space in the 'gene_space' attribute.
3564                # If the gene space has only 1 value, then select it. The old and new values of the gene are identical.
3565                if len(curr_gene_space) == 1:
3566                    value_from_space = curr_gene_space[0]
3567                    if not self.suppress_warnings: warnings.warn(
3568                        "You set 'allow_duplicate_genes=False' but the space of the gene with index {gene_idx} has only a single value. Thus, duplicates are possible.".format(
3569                            gene_idx=gene_idx))
3570                # If the gene space has more than 1 value, then select a new one that is different from the current value.
3571                else:
3572                    values_to_select_from = list(set(curr_gene_space) - set(solution))
3573                    if len(values_to_select_from) == 0:
3574                        if not self.suppress_warnings: warnings.warn(
3575                            "You set 'allow_duplicate_genes=False' but the gene space does not have enough values to prevent duplicates.")
3576                        value_from_space = solution[gene_idx]
3577                    else:
3578                        value_from_space = random.choice(values_to_select_from)
3579        else:
3580            # Selecting a value randomly from the global gene space in the 'gene_space' attribute.
3581            if type(self.gene_space) is dict:
3582                if self.gene_type_single == True:
3583                    if gene_type[0] in GA.supported_int_types:
3584                        if build_initial_pop == True:
3585                            if 'step' in self.gene_space.keys():
3586                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3587                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3588                                                                                   min_val=self.gene_space['low'],
3589                                                                                   max_val=self.gene_space['high'],
3590                                                                                   step=self.gene_space['step'],
3591                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3592                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3593                            else:
3594                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3595                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3596                                                                                   min_val=self.gene_space['low'],
3597                                                                                   max_val=self.gene_space['high'],
3598                                                                                   step=None,
3599                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3600                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3601                        else:
3602                            if 'step' in self.gene_space.keys():
3603                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3604                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3605                                                                                   min_val=self.gene_space['low'],
3606                                                                                   max_val=self.gene_space['high'],
3607                                                                                   step=self.gene_space['step'],
3608                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3609                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3610                            else:
3611                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3612                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3613                                                                                   min_val=self.gene_space['low'],
3614                                                                                   max_val=self.gene_space['high'],
3615                                                                                   step=None,
3616                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3617                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3618                    else:
3619                        # When the gene_space is assigned a dict object, then it specifies the lower and upper limits of all genes in the space.
3620                        if 'step' in self.gene_space.keys():
3621                            value_from_space = numpy.random.choice(numpy.arange(start=self.gene_space['low'],
3622                                                                                stop=self.gene_space['high'],
3623                                                                                step=self.gene_space['step']),
3624                                                                   size=1)
3625                        else:
3626                            value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.gene_space['low'],
3627                                                                    high=self.gene_space['high'],
3628                                                                    size=1)
3629                        if self.mutation_by_replacement:
3630                            pass
3631                        else:
3632                            value_from_space = solution[gene_idx] + value_from_space
3633                else:
3634                    if gene_type[gene_idx] in GA.supported_int_types:
3635                        if build_initial_pop == True:
3636                            if 'step' in self.gene_space.keys():
3637                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3638                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3639                                                                                   min_val=self.gene_space['low'],
3640                                                                                   max_val=self.gene_space['high'],
3641                                                                                   step=self.gene_space['step'],
3642                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3643                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3644                            else:
3645                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3646                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3647                                                                                   min_val=self.gene_space['low'],
3648                                                                                   max_val=self.gene_space['high'],
3649                                                                                   step=None,
3650                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3651                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3652                        else:
3653                            if 'step' in self.gene_space.keys():
3654                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3655                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3656                                                                                   min_val=self.gene_space['low'],
3657                                                                                   max_val=self.gene_space['high'],
3658                                                                                   step=self.gene_space['step'],
3659                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3660                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3661                            else:
3662                                value_from_space = self.unique_int_gene_from_range(solution=solution,
3663                                                                                   gene_index=gene_idx,
3664                                                                                   min_val=self.gene_space['low'],
3665                                                                                   max_val=self.gene_space['high'],
3666                                                                                   step=None,
3667                                                                                   mutation_by_replacement=True,
3668                                                                                   gene_type=gene_type)
3669                    else:
3670                        # When the gene_space is assigned a dict object, then it specifies the lower and upper limits of all genes in the space.
3671                        if 'step' in self.gene_space.keys():
3672                            value_from_space = numpy.random.choice(numpy.arange(start=self.gene_space['low'],
3673                                                                                stop=self.gene_space['high'],
3674                                                                                step=self.gene_space['step']),
3675                                                                   size=1)
3676                        else:
3677                            value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.gene_space['low'],
3678                                                                    high=self.gene_space['high'],
3679                                                                    size=1)
3680                        if self.mutation_by_replacement:
3681                            pass
3682                        else:
3683                            value_from_space = solution[gene_idx] + value_from_space
3684
3685            else:
3686                # If the space type is not of type dict, then a value is randomly selected from the gene_space attribute.
3687                values_to_select_from = list(set(self.gene_space) - set(solution))
3688                if len(values_to_select_from) == 0:
3689                    if not self.suppress_warnings: warnings.warn(
3690                        "You set 'allow_duplicate_genes=False' but the gene space does not have enough values to prevent duplicates.")
3691                    value_from_space = solution[gene_idx]
3692                else:
3693                    value_from_space = random.choice(values_to_select_from)
3694
3695        if value_from_space is None:
3696            value_from_space = numpy.random.uniform(low=self.random_mutation_min_val,
3697                                                    high=self.random_mutation_max_val,
3698                                                    size=1)
3699
3700        if self.gene_type_single == True:
3701            if not gene_type[1] is None:
3702                value_from_space = numpy.round(gene_type[0](value_from_space),
3703                                               gene_type[1])
3704            else:
3705                value_from_space = gene_type[0](value_from_space)
3706        else:
3707            if not gene_type[gene_idx][1] is None:
3708                value_from_space = numpy.round(gene_type[gene_idx][0](value_from_space),
3709                                               gene_type[gene_idx][1])
3710            else:
3711                value_from_space = gene_type[gene_idx][0](value_from_space)
3712
3713        return value_from_space

Returns a unique gene value for a single gene based on its value space to solve the duplicates.

solution: A solution with duplicate values. gene_idx: The index of the gene that duplicates its value with another gene. gene_type: Exactly the same as the self.gene_type attribute.

Returns: A unique value, if exists, for the gene.

def best_solution(self, pop_fitness=None): 
3715    def best_solution(self, pop_fitness=None):
3716
3717        """
3718        Returns information about the best solution found by the genetic algorithm.
3719        Accepts the following parameters:
3720            pop_fitness: An optional parameter holding the fitness values of the solutions in the current population. If None, then the cal_pop_fitness() method is called to calculate the fitness of the population.
3721        The following are returned:
3722            -best_solution: Best solution in the current population.
3723            -best_solution_fitness: Fitness value of the best solution.
3724            -best_match_idx: Index of the best solution in the current population.
3725        """
3726
3727        # Getting the best solution after finishing all generations.
3728        # At first, the fitness is calculated for each solution in the final generation.
3729        if pop_fitness is None:
3730            pop_fitness = self.cal_pop_fitness()
3731        # Then return the index of that solution corresponding to the best fitness.
3732        best_match_idx = numpy.where(pop_fitness == numpy.max(pop_fitness))[0][0]
3733
3734        best_solution = self.population[best_match_idx, :].copy()
3735        best_solution_fitness = pop_fitness[best_match_idx]
3736        # print(best_solution_fitness)
3737        return best_solution, best_solution_fitness, best_match_idx

Returns information about the best solution found by the genetic algorithm. Accepts the following parameters: pop_fitness: An optional parameter holding the fitness values of the solutions in the current population. If None, then the cal_pop_fitness() method is called to calculate the fitness of the population. The following are returned: -best_solution: Best solution in the current population. -best_solution_fitness: Fitness value of the best solution. -best_match_idx: Index of the best solution in the current population.

def plot_result( self, title='PyGAD - Generation vs. Fitness', xlabel='Generation', ylabel='Fitness', linewidth=3, font_size=14, plot_type='plot', color='#3870FF', save_dir=None): 
3739    def plot_result(self,
3740                    title="PyGAD - Generation vs. Fitness",
3741                    xlabel="Generation",
3742                    ylabel="Fitness",
3743                    linewidth=3,
3744                    font_size=14,
3745                    plot_type="plot",
3746                    color="#3870FF",
3747                    save_dir=None):
3748
3749        if not self.suppress_warnings:
3750            warnings.warn(
3751                "Please use the plot_fitness() method instead of plot_result(). The plot_result() method will be removed in the future.")
3752
3753        return self.plot_fitness(title=title,
3754                                 xlabel=xlabel,
3755                                 ylabel=ylabel,
3756                                 linewidth=linewidth,
3757                                 font_size=font_size,
3758                                 plot_type=plot_type,
3759                                 color=color,
3760                                 save_dir=save_dir)
def plot_fitness( self, title='PyGAD - Generation vs. Fitness', xlabel='Generation', ylabel='Fitness', linewidth=3, font_size=14, plot_type='plot', color='#3870FF', save_dir=None): 
3762    def plot_fitness(self,
3763                     title="PyGAD - Generation vs. Fitness",
3764                     xlabel="Generation",
3765                     ylabel="Fitness",
3766                     linewidth=3,
3767                     font_size=14,
3768                     plot_type="plot",
3769                     color="#3870FF",
3770                     save_dir=None):
3771
3772        """
3773        Creates, shows, and returns a figure that summarizes how the fitness value evolved by generation. Can only be called after completing at least 1 generation. If no generation is completed, an exception is raised.
3774
3775        Accepts the following:
3776            title: Figure title.
3777            xlabel: Label on the X-axis.
3778            ylabel: Label on the Y-axis.
3779            linewidth: Line width of the plot. Defaults to 3.
3780            font_size: Font size for the labels and title. Defaults to 14.
3781            plot_type: Type of the plot which can be either "plot" (default), "scatter", or "bar".
3782            color: Color of the plot which defaults to "#3870FF".
3783            save_dir: Directory to save the figure.
3784
3785        Returns the figure.
3786        """
3787
3788        if self.generations_completed < 1:
3789            raise RuntimeError(
3790                "The plot_fitness() (i.e. plot_result()) method can only be called after completing at least 1 generation but ({generations_completed}) is completed.".format(
3791                    generations_completed=self.generations_completed))
3792
3793        #        if self.run_completed == False:
3794        #            if not self.suppress_warnings: warnings.warn("Warning calling the plot_result() method: \nGA is not executed yet and there are no results to display. Please call the run() method before calling the plot_result() method.\n")
3795
3796        fig = matplotlib.pyplot.figure()
3797        if plot_type == "plot":
3798            matplotlib.pyplot.plot(self.best_solutions_fitness, linewidth=linewidth, color=color)
3799        elif plot_type == "scatter":
3800            matplotlib.pyplot.scatter(range(self.generations_completed + 1), self.best_solutions_fitness,
3801                                      linewidth=linewidth, color=color)
3802        elif plot_type == "bar":
3803            matplotlib.pyplot.bar(range(self.generations_completed + 1), self.best_solutions_fitness,
3804                                  linewidth=linewidth, color=color)
3805        matplotlib.pyplot.title(title, fontsize=font_size)
3806        matplotlib.pyplot.xlabel(xlabel, fontsize=font_size)
3807        matplotlib.pyplot.ylabel(ylabel, fontsize=font_size)
3808
3809        if not save_dir is None:
3810            matplotlib.pyplot.savefig(fname=save_dir,
3811                                      bbox_inches='tight')
3812        matplotlib.pyplot.show()
3813
3814        return fig

Creates, shows, and returns a figure that summarizes how the fitness value evolved by generation. Can only be called after completing at least 1 generation. If no generation is completed, an exception is raised.

Accepts the following: title: Figure title. xlabel: Label on the X-axis. ylabel: Label on the Y-axis. linewidth: Line width of the plot. Defaults to 3. font_size: Font size for the labels and title. Defaults to 14. plot_type: Type of the plot which can be either "plot" (default), "scatter", or "bar". color: Color of the plot which defaults to "#3870FF". save_dir: Directory to save the figure.

Returns the figure.

def plot_new_solution_rate( self, title='PyGAD - Generation vs. New Solution Rate', xlabel='Generation', ylabel='New Solution Rate', linewidth=3, font_size=14, plot_type='plot', color='#3870FF', save_dir=None): 
3816    def plot_new_solution_rate(self,
3817                               title="PyGAD - Generation vs. New Solution Rate",
3818                               xlabel="Generation",
3819                               ylabel="New Solution Rate",
3820                               linewidth=3,
3821                               font_size=14,
3822                               plot_type="plot",
3823                               color="#3870FF",
3824                               save_dir=None):
3825
3826        """
3827        Creates, shows, and returns a figure that summarizes the rate of exploring new solutions. This method works only when save_solutions=True in the constructor of the pygad.GA class.
3828
3829        Accepts the following:
3830            title: Figure title.
3831            xlabel: Label on the X-axis.
3832            ylabel: Label on the Y-axis.
3833            linewidth: Line width of the plot. Defaults to 3.
3834            font_size: Font size for the labels and title. Defaults to 14.
3835            plot_type: Type of the plot which can be either "plot" (default), "scatter", or "bar".
3836            color: Color of the plot which defaults to "#3870FF".
3837            save_dir: Directory to save the figure.
3838
3839        Returns the figure.
3840        """
3841
3842        if self.generations_completed < 1:
3843            raise RuntimeError(
3844                "The plot_new_solution_rate() method can only be called after completing at least 1 generation but ({generations_completed}) is completed.".format(
3845                    generations_completed=self.generations_completed))
3846
3847        if self.save_solutions == False:
3848            raise RuntimeError(
3849                "The plot_new_solution_rate() method works only when save_solutions=True in the constructor of the pygad.GA class.")
3850
3851        unique_solutions = set()
3852        num_unique_solutions_per_generation = []
3853        for generation_idx in range(self.generations_completed):
3854
3855            len_before = len(unique_solutions)
3856
3857            start = generation_idx * self.sol_per_pop
3858            end = start + self.sol_per_pop
3859
3860            for sol in self.solutions[start:end]:
3861                unique_solutions.add(tuple(sol))
3862
3863            len_after = len(unique_solutions)
3864
3865            generation_num_unique_solutions = len_after - len_before
3866            num_unique_solutions_per_generation.append(generation_num_unique_solutions)
3867
3868        fig = matplotlib.pyplot.figure()
3869        if plot_type == "plot":
3870            matplotlib.pyplot.plot(num_unique_solutions_per_generation, linewidth=linewidth, color=color)
3871        elif plot_type == "scatter":
3872            matplotlib.pyplot.scatter(range(self.generations_completed), num_unique_solutions_per_generation,
3873                                      linewidth=linewidth, color=color)
3874        elif plot_type == "bar":
3875            matplotlib.pyplot.bar(range(self.generations_completed), num_unique_solutions_per_generation,
3876                                  linewidth=linewidth, color=color)
3877        matplotlib.pyplot.title(title, fontsize=font_size)
3878        matplotlib.pyplot.xlabel(xlabel, fontsize=font_size)
3879        matplotlib.pyplot.ylabel(ylabel, fontsize=font_size)
3880
3881        if not save_dir is None:
3882            matplotlib.pyplot.savefig(fname=save_dir,
3883                                      bbox_inches='tight')
3884        matplotlib.pyplot.show()
3885
3886        return fig

Creates, shows, and returns a figure that summarizes the rate of exploring new solutions. This method works only when save_solutions=True in the constructor of the pygad.GA class.

Accepts the following: title: Figure title. xlabel: Label on the X-axis. ylabel: Label on the Y-axis. linewidth: Line width of the plot. Defaults to 3. font_size: Font size for the labels and title. Defaults to 14. plot_type: Type of the plot which can be either "plot" (default), "scatter", or "bar". color: Color of the plot which defaults to "#3870FF". save_dir: Directory to save the figure.

Returns the figure.

def plot_genes( self, title='PyGAD - Gene', xlabel='Gene', ylabel='Value', linewidth=3, font_size=14, plot_type='plot', graph_type='plot', fill_color='#3870FF', color='black', solutions='all', save_dir=None): 
3888    def plot_genes(self,
3889                   title="PyGAD - Gene",
3890                   xlabel="Gene",
3891                   ylabel="Value",
3892                   linewidth=3,
3893                   font_size=14,
3894                   plot_type="plot",
3895                   graph_type="plot",
3896                   fill_color="#3870FF",
3897                   color="black",
